title: ChatGPT Use Cases
text:
Preface
A collection of personal use cases of ChatGPT.

title: 1  Learn Foreign Language
text:
1.1.1 Grammar Point: 언제든지 (Anytime)
Sample Sentences:

언제든지 제 방에 들어오세요.

(You can come into my room anytime.)

질문이 있으면 언제든지 물어보세요.

(If you have any questions, feel free to ask anytime.)

언제든지 휴식을 취할 수 있습니다.

(You can take a break anytime.)


Verbs Used:

들어오다 (들어오세요) - to come in
물어보다 (물어보세요) - to ask
취하다 (취할 수 있습니다) - to take (a break)



1.1.2 Grammar Point: 처음이지만 (Although it’s the first time)
Sample Sentences:

이 도시에 처음 왔지만, 길 찾기가 쉽습니다.

(It’s my first time in this city, but finding my way is easy.)

처음으로 한국어 수업을 듣지만, 매우 흥미롭습니다.

(It’s my first time taking a Korean class, but it’s very interesting.)

처음으로 요리를 해보지만, 잘 될 것 같아요.

(I’m cooking for the first time, but I think it will go well.)


Verbs Used:

오다 (왔지만) - to come
듣다 (듣지만) - to listen, to take (a class)
해보다 (해보지만) - to try (doing something), to attempt



1.1.3 Grammar Point: -기 때문에 (-because)
Sample Sentences:

오늘은 피곤하기 때문에 일찍 잘 거예요.

(I will go to bed early today because I’m tired.)

비가 오기 때문에 우산을 가져갔어요.

(I took an umbrella because it’s raining.)

학생들이 열심히 공부하기 때문에 성적이 좋습니다.

(The students have good grades because they study hard.)


Verbs Used:

피곤하다 (피곤하기 때문에) - to be tired
오다 (오기 때문에) - to come, to fall (rain)
공부하다 (공부하기 때문에) - to study



1.1.4 Grammar Point: 잘 (well)
Sample Sentences:

그는 피아노를 잘 칩니다.

(He plays the piano well.)

우리 팀은 프로젝트를 잘 마쳤습니다.

(Our team finished the project well.)

그녀는 춤을 정말 잘 춥니다.

(She dances really well.)


Verbs Used:

치다 (칩니다) - to play (an instrument)
마치다 (마쳤습니다) - to finish, to complete
추다 (춥니다) - to dance



1.1.5 Grammar Point: 부드러워서 (because it’s gentle/soft)
Sample Sentences:

그 고양이는 털이 부드러워서 만지기 좋아요.

(That cat’s fur is soft, so it’s nice to touch.)

그는 성격이 부드러워서 많은 친구가 있습니다.

(He has many friends because he has a gentle personality.)

음악이 부드러워서 마음이 편해집니다.

(The music is soft, so it soothes my mind.)


Verbs Used:

만지다 (만지기 좋아요) - to touch
있다 (있습니다) - to have, to exist (in the context of possessing a trait)
편해지다 (편해집니다) - to become comfortable, to relax

title: 1  Learn Foreign Language
text:
2.1 Workflow 1: Grammar and Verbs






Start a Korean Conversation with iOS Shortcuts



I’m going to practice some Korean with you. Please repeat what I say in Korean and make sure you understand and correct any grammar errors if you find any, and keep your answer succinct. Don’t ask me “what else can I help you?” or “keep going”.
…

Please summarize the grammar points in our conversation in Korean.
Please construct sample sentences using the grammar points you summarized for me to improve my reading ability and the understanding of those grammar points.
Please give me three sample sentences for each grammar point.
Can you also gave me the verbs in the sample sentences for me to study as well

Wrap-up
Let’s wrap up this conversation. Please provide the following information in the markdown format.

grammar points
3 sample sentences for each grammar points.
verbs used in the sample sentences. You can re-use the ones that you gave me above.
